text: Marija Šerifović (born November 14, 1984) is a singer who won the Eurovision Song Contest in 2007 with the ballad Molitva, which was sung in Serbian. She was born in Kragujevac, Serbia. Nina Badrić ==Other websites== * Marija Serifovic's Serbian page Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest winners
title: Marija Šerifović
